title: O Tamashii Nations - Yu Yu Hakusho - Yusuke Urameshi, Bandai Spirits S.H.Figuarts Action Figure que vai fazer a diferença
excerpt: O Tamashii Nations - Yu Yu Hakusho - Yusuke Urameshi, Bandai Spirits S.H.Figuarts Action Figure que vai fazer a diferença

product.title: Tamashii Nations - Yu Yu Hakusho - Yusuke Urameshi, Bandai Spirits S.H.Figuarts Action Figure
product.description: From "Yu Yu Hakusho", "Yusuke Urameshi" joins S.H.Figuarts in his costume during the Dark Martial Arts Arc!, Four types of interchangeable facial parts are included, and by replacing them with hair parts with the hair down, a total of 10 different expressions can be reproduced, In addition, this luxurious set includes two types of Reigun effect parts, a dedicated pedestal for the Reigun effect parts (firing), and Pooh, [Set Contents] Main body, Interchangeable hands (3 left, 4 right), 4 interchangeable face parts, Interchangeable head, Pooh, Spirit ball effect parts (charge), Spirit bullet effect parts (fire), A set of dedicated pedestals for the Reigan effect parts (firing), The product box will have a Bandai Namco warning label, which is proof that you are purchasing an officially licensed Bandai Spirits product
